Member Data Documentation

PxReal PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mCentreBias

Maximum allowed ratio of average front wheel rotation speed and rear wheel rotation speeds.

Only applied to DIFF_TYPE_LS_4WD Range: (1,inf)

PxReal PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mFrontBias

Maximum allowed ratio of front-left and front-right wheel rotation speeds.

Only applied to DIFF_TYPE_LS_4WD and DIFF_TYPE_LS_FRONTWD Range: (1,inf)

PxReal PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mFrontLeftRightSplit

Ratio of torque split between front-left and front-right (>0.5 means more to front-left, <0.5 means more to front-right).

Only applied to DIFF_TYPE_LS_4WD and eDIFF_TYPE_OPEN_4WD and eDIFF_TYPE_LS_FRONTWD Range: (0,1)

PxReal PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mFrontRearSplit

Ratio of torque split between front and rear (>0.5 means more to front, <0.5 means more to rear).

Only applied to DIFF_TYPE_LS_4WD and eDIFF_TYPE_OPEN_4WD Range: (0,1)

PxReal PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mPad[1] [private]

PxReal PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mRearBias

Maximum allowed ratio of rear-left and rear-right wheel rotation speeds.

Only applied to DIFF_TYPE_LS_4WD and DIFF_TYPE_LS_REARWD Range: (1,inf)

PxReal PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mRearLeftRightSplit

Ratio of torque split between rear-left and rear-right (>0.5 means more to rear-left, <0.5 means more to rear-right).

Only applied to DIFF_TYPE_LS_4WD and eDIFF_TYPE_OPEN_4WD and eDIFF_TYPE_LS_REARWD Range: (0,1)

PxU32 PxVehicleDifferential4WData::mType

Type of differential. Range: (DIFF_TYPE_LS_4WD,DIFF_TYPE_OPEN_FRONTWD)
.
